text_block_list.text: (Clattering…)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: The blizzard has gotten really strong… The night sky is said to be beautiful up here… but we may be unable to see it tonight.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Woah… It's gotten real rough out there. When did that happen…?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It started snowing this bad around 30 minutes ago or so. Jeez, have you been absorbed in that game the whole time?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: It's cause…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Oh, nothing… It's gotten as white as your hair out there.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Why would you phrase it that way…? Anyways, if the blizzard gets any worse it might affect the foothills as well. And if that happens…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Even if Ticket feels better… she might not be able to join us tonight.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: We wouldn't be able to guarantee her safety… And even if we told her it was dangerous she'd needlessly push through to try and join us. I have to do something…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hey, you should stop worrying about Ticket. It's the weather after all, so there's no point worrying about something you can't control.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But if we leave it as is, Ticket will…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Plus, she's not the type of person to be stopped by this amount of snowfall. She's probably already shouted "sickness and health start with the mind" and cured herself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: And if you don't come, I won't be able to give that to you…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Anyways, Hayahide weren't you the one who said she could make miracles happen? If you're gonna believe in her, believe in her until the end.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I truly have some great friends, don't I?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh? What's with you?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Both you and Ticket are always there to provide a perspective that I myself do not have. Particularly now. Taishin, having you here is truly reassuring.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You don't hesitate when stating your opinion, and moreover you're a caring individual. It's been worrying you that I've been preparing the party alone, hasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm not worried at all…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Really? Then let me guess what you were going to say earlier. "I play games to pass the time since you won't let me help prepare."

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you are a very kind individual. However, there are times where someone wants to take care of the preparations alone in order to please their friends.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: To put it bluntly, simply having the two of you with me brings me all the joy in the world. That's why I've been a bit overzealous with my preparation.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Anyways… maybe we should contact Ticket. Something like "we've finished preparations here, so take your time…"

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I don't get you… dummy…
(Rumbling…)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Did you say something?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Nope… It was probably something from outside. It seems like the blizzard's gotten even worse…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Fan
text_block_list.text: Ah, Ogurin! It wasn't too cold for you out there, was it? Don't worry, we've got some warm food being made for you, so just wait a little longer!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: A-Ahh… Thank you…! I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I… really am looking forward to it, but… what do I do…? I can't decide on a present!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I couldn't find a reindeer, and no matter how much I thought about it, I couldn't grow a beard either… I guess I really couldn't become Santa… But…

text_block_list.name: Fan's Child
text_block_list.text: Eeh, there's no star!?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: What's the matter? Did something happen?

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Ah… It's about the star that was made for the Christmas tree. The kids made it specially for this party, so we made sure to safely and securely transport it here, but…

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: A blizzard caused the roads to close down, so the truck can't get here.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I see. So the star won't be arriving…?

text_block_list.name: Fan's Child
text_block_list.text: So the star really isn't coming!? It was supposed to surprise Oguri! It was really amazing!

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Hmm… I'm sorry to say, but, if they can't use the roads then the truck can't come… But don't worry, she can see the star tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Fan's Child
text_block_list.text: But we made it for this Christmas party… We made it to help cheer up Oguri…

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Hey, no need to say those things…

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: I… humbly apologize for what has happened, but… don't worry, once the party starts the children should…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm going.

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm going to go get the star.
